content: Credit Card Transportation SCB Unlimited Cashback Card Asked by AnonymousAsked 3w agoWhich card to use for public transport?Now that the promotions are over, which cashback cards are eligible for public transport rebates? I note that all Citi cards do not award rebates for Simplygo, but SMRT gives up to 2% for EZ-reload. Also, is there still a convenience fee if I use SC Unlimited for EZ-reload?2 answersAnswerBump0
